title: D5 issues
body: I know riot talked about the problems in d5 but they aren't fixed yet. I recently won 5 Ina row then lost 2 and ended up at 0 points, then won 6 in a row, lost 2 and dropped to 0 points. Obviously this doesnt happen all the time but I still have a positive win rate and what makes it really hard to climb is all the trolls in d5 becuae of the messed up lp gain so they know they can't climb so they don't even try
